definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: While his father Terah was still alive, Haran died in Ur of the Chaldeans, in the land of his birth.
sentences.chinese: 哈蘭死在他的本地迦勒底的吾珥，在他父親他拉之先。

sentences.english: This land extended from Aroer on the rim of the Arnon Gorge to Mount Siyon (that is, Hermon)
sentences.chinese: 從亞嫩谷邊的亞羅珥，直到西雲山，就是黑門山。

sentences.english: Judah got a wife for Er, his firstborn, and her name was Tamar.
sentences.chinese: 猶大爲長子珥娶妻，名叫他瑪。

sentences.english: The sons of Laadan； the chief was Jehiel， and Zetham， and Joel， three.
sentences.chinese: 拉但的長子是耶歇，還有細坦和約珥，共三人。

sentences.english: She became pregnant and gave birth to a son, who was named Er.
sentences.chinese: 她就懷孕生了兒子，猶大給他起名叫珥。

sentences.english: The children of Gibbar, ninety and five.
And Judah took a wife for Er his firstborn， whose name was Tamar.
sentences.chinese: 猶大爲長子珥娶妻，名叫他瑪。

sentences.english: The sons of Ladan: Jehiel the first, Zetham and Joel-three in all.
sentences.chinese: 拉但的長子是耶歇，還有細坦和約珥，共三人。

sentences.english: Then on the day after, Pashhur let Jeremiah loose.
sentences.chinese: 次日，巴施戶珥將耶利米開枷釋放。

sentences.english: And Haran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity, in Ur of the Chaldees.
sentences.chinese: 哈蘭死在他的本地迦勒底的吾珥，在他父親他拉之先。

sentences.english: From Aroer， which is by the bank of the river Arnon， even unto mount Sion， which is Hermon
sentences.chinese: 從亞嫩谷邊的亞羅珥，直到西雲山，就是黑門山。

sentences.english: So we stayed in the valley near Beth Peor.
sentences.chinese: 於是我們住在伯毘珥對面的谷中。

definition: vessel used for grain offerings/also pr. [lian2]
black horse/jet steed/good horse/legendary black dragon
